header.description:
Normal map based Vanilla RTX resource pack, Includes a subpack for Heightmaps (accessible via Gear Icon by clicking on pack), All blocks are covered!
Discord.gg/dx92mDNMTX
Attention: Restart Minecraft to switch between subpacks!
By: CubeIR
header.name: Vanilla RTX Normals

subpacks.name: §3Vanilla RTX Normals - §9Normal Maps - Default look of Vanilla RTX normals using 16x normals maps
